C

calculateInterest(double) - Method in class CreditCard
This method calculates and returns the amount of interest that will be charged on the balance owing on the CreditCard when given the interest rate as a percentage.
cardHolderName - Variable in class CreditCard
The name of the card holder
cardNumber - Variable in class CreditCard
 
CreditCard - Class in <Unnamed>
This class represents a Credit Card.
CreditCard(String, String) - Constructor for class CreditCard
This method constructs a CreditCard with the specified card holder name and number.
currentBalance - Variable in class CreditCard
 

G

getCardHolderName() - Method in class CreditCard
This method retrieves the name of the card holder.

This method retrieves the card number.
getCurrentBalance() - Method in class CreditCard
This method retrieves the current balance owing.

M

makeAPayment(double) - Method in class CreditCard
This method is called to reduce the balance owing on the card by the payment amount.

S

setCurrentBalance(double) - Method in class CreditCard
This method is called to add the price of a purchase to the card's balance owing.
